name: Kanken 3級 Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: 促進
cards.meaning: promotion, acceleration, encouragement, facilitation, spurring on

cards.question: 移籍
cards.meaning: changing household registry, transfer (e.g. of one's name in the register)

cards.question: 貫
cards.meaning: kan (obs. unit of weight, approx. 3.75 kg, 8.3 lb), crosspiece (between pillars, etc.), penetrating tie beam

cards.question: 不審
cards.meaning: incomplete understanding, doubt, question, distrust, suspicion, strangeness, infidelity

cards.question: 敢行
cards.meaning: decisive action, going through with, daring to do, carrying out

cards.question: 赴任
cards.meaning: moving to a different location to start a new job, (proceeding to) new appointment

cards.question: 応募
cards.meaning: application, subscription, entry (competition, raffle, etc.), enlistment

cards.question: 憂色
cards.meaning: melancholy air, anxious look, traces of sorrow, gloom

cards.question: 抑止
cards.meaning: check, checkmate, stave off, control, restraint, inhibit, deterrent, deterrence

cards.question: 誘導
cards.meaning: guidance, leading, induction, introduction, incitement, inducement

cards.question: 繁華街
cards.meaning: business district, shopping district, bustling street, shopping centre, shopping center, downtown

cards.question: 虚
cards.meaning: sky, the air, the heavens, hollow, cavity, hole, unpreparedness

cards.question: 少憩
cards.meaning: short rest, recess, short break, breather, brief recess, rest

cards.question: 主催
cards.meaning: sponsorship (i.e. conducting under one's auspices), promotion, organizing, organising, hosting, staging

cards.question: 掃討
cards.meaning: cleaning up, sweeping up, mopping up

cards.question: 雪辱
cards.meaning: vindication of honour, vindication of honor, making up for loss, revenge

cards.question: 浸す
cards.meaning: to soak, to dip, to steep, to immerse

cards.question: 交錯
cards.meaning: mixture, blending, complication, crossing, intersecting, interlacing

cards.question: 掌握
cards.meaning: grasping, seizing, holding, commanding, having control over

cards.question: 敢行
cards.meaning: decisive action, going through with, daring to do, carrying out

cards.question: 食糧
cards.meaning: food (esp. staple food such as rice or wheat), provisions, rations, food supply

cards.question: 交換
cards.meaning: exchange, interchange, switching, reciprocity, barter, substitution, replacement, clearing (of checks, cheques)

cards.question: 巧み
cards.meaning: skillful, adroit, dexterous, masterful, clever, ingenious, cunning

cards.question: 哀れ
cards.meaning: pity, sorrow, grief, misery, compassion, pathos

cards.question: 求刑
cards.meaning: recommended sentence, prosecution's demand for punishment

cards.question: 佳境
cards.meaning: climax (story), best part, most interesting part

cards.question: 慰める
cards.meaning: to comfort, to console, to amuse

cards.question: 甲乙
cards.meaning: A and B, excellent and good, similarity

cards.question: 塊
cards.meaning: lump, mass, bundle, clump, clod, cluster

cards.question: 忌引き
cards.meaning: absence from work (school) due to mourning

cards.question: 欺く
cards.meaning: to deceive, to delude, to trick, to fool

cards.question: 鐘
cards.meaning: bell (often a large hanging bell), chime

cards.question: 福祉
cards.meaning: welfare, well-being, social welfare, social security, social service

cards.question: 侍
cards.meaning: warrior (esp. of military retainers of daimyos in the Edo period), samurai

cards.question: 遵守
cards.meaning: compliance, adherence (to a set of rules), (religious) observance

cards.question: 神髄
cards.meaning: essence, quintessence, spirit, soul, heart, pith, pith and marrow

cards.question: 雑炊
cards.meaning: rice gruel containing vegetables, fish, etc., and seasoned with miso or soy sauce

cards.question: 繕う
cards.meaning: to mend, to patch up, to repair, to fix, to darn

cards.question: 金塊
cards.meaning: gold nugget, gold bullion, gold bar, gold ingot

cards.question: 締結
cards.meaning: conclusion, execution (of a contract), entering (into treaty)

cards.question: 促す
cards.meaning: to urge, to encourage, to press, to prompt, to draw (attention to)

cards.question: 停滞
cards.meaning: stagnation, tie-up, congestion, retention, accumulation, falling into arrears

cards.question: 愛憎
cards.meaning: love and hate, likes and dislikes

cards.question: 賢明
cards.meaning: wise, sensible, well-advised, intelligent, sagacious, prudent

cards.question: 北斗
cards.meaning: the Big Dipper (asterism), the Plough, the Plow

cards.question: 同胞
cards.meaning: brethren, brothers, fellow countrymen, fellowman, compatriot

cards.question: 危篤
cards.meaning: critical condition, being on the verge of death

cards.question: 顧みる
cards.meaning: to look back (e.g. over shoulder or at the past), to turn around

cards.question: 怪しい
cards.meaning: suspicious, dubious, doubtful, dodgy, suspicious (referring to a potential amorous relation), dangerous (e.g. financial situation), ominous (e.g. weather), strange, shady, fishy

cards.question: 姫君
cards.meaning: daughter of a person of high rank (i.e. a king, noble, aristocrat, etc.)

cards.question: 凝らす
cards.meaning: to concentrate, to devote, to apply, to strain, to rack, to freeze, to congeal

cards.question: 企てる
cards.meaning: to plan, to plot, to propose, to design, to intend, to contemplate

cards.question: 相伴
cards.meaning: partaking, participating, taking part in, sharing (something with someone)

cards.question: 該当
cards.meaning: corresponding to, being applicable to, being relevant to, coming under, falling under, fulfilling (requirements), meeting (conditions), qualifying for

cards.question: 滑り
cards.meaning: sliding, slipping, slime, mucus, sliminess, viscous liquid

cards.question: 名簿
cards.meaning: register of names, list of names, roll, register, proof of identity (for nobles, doctors, etc.) (Heian period)

cards.question: 赴く
cards.meaning: to go in the direction of, to proceed toward, to proceed according to, to repair to, to betake oneself to

cards.question: 催す
cards.meaning: to hold (an event), to give (a dinner, party, etc.)

cards.question: 記念碑
cards.meaning: commemorative plaque (usu. on a stone), stone monument (bearing an inscription)

cards.question: 遂げる
cards.meaning: to accomplish, to achieve, to carry out

cards.question: 覆う
cards.meaning: to cover, to hide, to conceal, to wrap, to disguise

cards.question: 芳香
cards.meaning: perfume, fragrance, aroma, balm, sweet scent

cards.question: 崩壊
cards.meaning: collapse, crumbling, breaking down, caving in

cards.question: 擦り
cards.meaning: rubbing, scrubbing, scraping, grazing, touching lightly

cards.question: 厘
cards.meaning: one-hundredth, 0.3 mm (one-hundredth of a sun), 0.1 percent (one-hundredth of a wari), 0.0375 grams (one-hundredth of a monme)

cards.question: 募る
cards.meaning: to grow violent, to become stronger, to become worse

cards.question: 削る
cards.meaning: to shave (wood, leather, etc.), to sharpen (e.g. pencil), to plane, to whittle, to pare, to scrape off, to erode, to shave off (esp. concrete)

cards.question: 某
cards.meaning: certain, one, someone, unknown person, certain amount, some

cards.question: 乏しい
cards.meaning: meagre, meager, scarce, limited, destitute, hard up, lacking, scanty, poor

cards.question: 擁護
cards.meaning: protection, advocacy, support, defence, championship, vindication

cards.question: 施す
cards.meaning: to give (time, money, goods), to donate

cards.question: 魅力
cards.meaning: charm, fascination, glamour, glamor, attraction, appeal

cards.question: 漏電
cards.meaning: short circuit, leakage (of electricity), electrical fault

cards.question: 慌てる
cards.meaning: to become confused (disconcerted, disorganized, disorganised), to be flustered, to panic

cards.question: 墨
cards.meaning: sumi, India ink, Chinese ink, ink stick, ink-cake, Mexico

cards.question: 大綱
cards.meaning: fundamental principles, outline, general features, thick rope

cards.question: 諮る
cards.meaning: to consult with, to discuss, to confer, to deliberate

cards.question: 粋
cards.meaning: chic, smart, stylish, tasteful, refined, sophisticated, worldly (esp. in terms of being familiar with the the red light district, geishas and actors)

cards.question: 膨大
cards.meaning: huge, vast, enormous, colossal, extensive, large

cards.question: 憂い
cards.meaning: sorrow, grief, anguish, distress, unhappy, sad, gloomy

cards.question: 架ける
cards.meaning: to suspend between two points, to build (a bridge, etc.), to put up on something (e.g. legs up on table)

cards.question: 凍える
cards.meaning: to freeze (of one's body), to be frozen, to become numb (with cold), to be chilled

cards.question: 疾風
cards.meaning: gale, strong wind, swift wind, fresh breeze (Beaufort scale)

cards.question: 鋳る
cards.meaning: to cast, to mint, to coin

cards.question: 滞る
cards.meaning: to stagnate, to be delayed, to be left undone

cards.question: 掛かり
cards.meaning: starting, engaging, taking a quantity (of time, people, etc.)

cards.question: 撮影
cards.meaning: photography (still or motion), photographing, filming, shooting, (video) recording

cards.question: 隔絶
cards.meaning: isolation, separation, remoteness, seclusion, reclusion, inaccessibility, sequestration

cards.question: 甲
cards.meaning: carapace, shell, helmet (of armor, armour), headpiece, armor, armour, first sign of the Chinese calendar, treble range (in Japanese music), high note

cards.question: 一掃
cards.meaning: clean sweep, purging, doing away with, eradication

cards.question: 掲載
cards.meaning: publication (e.g. article in paper), appearance, insertion

cards.question: 実施
cards.meaning: enforcement, implementation, putting into practice, carrying out, operation, working (e.g. working parameters), enactment

cards.question: 破棄
cards.meaning: tearing up and discarding (e.g. documents), disposal (e.g. weaponry), destruction

cards.question: 慈悲
cards.meaning: compassion (e.g. of Buddha), benevolence, charity, mercy

cards.question: 無謀
cards.meaning: reckless, thoughtless, rash, ill-advised, impulsive, mad (e.g. scheme)

cards.question: 開催
cards.meaning: holding a meeting, opening an exhibition, hosting (e.g. the Olympics)

cards.question: 拘置所

cards.question: 克服

cards.question: 豪華
cards.meaning: wonderful, gorgeous, splendor, splendour, pomp, extravagance

cards.question: 不穏
cards.meaning: disquieting, threatening, turbulent, restless, unsettled, disturbing

cards.question: 携わる
cards.meaning: to engage in, to participate in, to take part in, to be involved in

cards.question: 零落
cards.meaning: falling into straitened circumstances, downfall, ruin

cards.question: 屈伸
cards.meaning: bending and stretching (exercise), flexing and extending

cards.question: 満喫
cards.meaning: having enough of (food, drink, etc.), having one's fill

cards.question: 精粗
cards.meaning: fineness or coarseness, minuteness or roughness

cards.meaning: channel (e.g. between two land masses), strait

cards.question: 濫用
cards.meaning: abuse, misuse, misappropriation, using to excess

cards.question: 没頭
cards.meaning: immersing oneself in, being absorbed in, devoting oneself to, giving oneself up entirely to

cards.question: 瀬踏み
cards.meaning: sounding out, measuring the depths (of a river)

cards.question: 遭遇
cards.meaning: encounter, being confronted with (e.g. difficulty), meeting with (e.g. accident)

cards.question: 双方
cards.meaning: two way, both parties, mutual, both

cards.question: 克明
cards.meaning: detailed, scrupulous, careful, minute, faithful, elaborate

cards.question: 揺れ

cards.question: 徐々
cards.meaning: gradually, steadily, quietly, slowly, little by little

cards.question: 委託
cards.meaning: entrusting (something to a person), consignment (of goods), putting in someone's charge, trust, commission

cards.question: 妨げる

cards.question: 内紛
cards.meaning: domestic discord, internal discord, internal strife, internal struggle, infighting

cards.question: 寝癖
cards.meaning: bed hair, hair disarranged during sleep

cards.question: 画廊
cards.meaning: art gallery (esp. artworks for sale), picture gallery

cards.question: 失墜
cards.meaning: abasement, fall, forfeiture, sinking (in people's estimation)

cards.question: 了承
cards.meaning: acknowledgement, acknowledgment, understanding (e.g. "please be understanding of the mess during our renovation"), noting, acceptance

cards.question: 恋慕

cards.question: 驚く
cards.meaning: to be surprised, to be astonished

cards.question: 排除
cards.meaning: exclusion, removal, rejection, elimination, abatement, lifting (sanctions, etc.)

cards.question: 漏れる
cards.meaning: to leak out, to escape, to come through, to shine through, to filter out

cards.question: 某
cards.meaning: certain, one, someone, unknown person, certain amount, some

cards.question: 疾駆
